EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
{!Contact.FirstName},
HeadStart applications close this Sunday!
Applied? Well done! We're delighted to have you on the programme.
Not yet applied or finished an application? Make sure you get it done ASAP, numbers with our HeadStart volunteering partners are filling up fast. Don't miss out on your exclusive opportunity to take part!
Remember, through the programme you can:
Volunteer in your local community Attend exclusive employability workshops Get a guaranteed job interview with one of our leading corporate sponsors
Click HERE to apply.
You will need either your email address or your NCS ID, and the below PIN to log in to the site. If you have logged in to a NCS site before, you can use your current password to log in:
Email Address: {!Contact.Email}
NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c}
PIN: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
If you have any difficulties or need to ask us a question, please email us at headstart@the-challenge.org
We look forward to receiving your application!
The HeadStart team
